game.title: Rescue the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the clutches of the evil dragon
game.description: You must navigate through the treacherous terrain, overcome various obstacles and enemies, and finally defeat the dragon to rescue the princess.
game.reward: The gratitude of the kingdom and the hand of the Princess in marriage

task.description: Search for clues and ask around to find the location of the dragon's lair
Use your strength and cunning to defeat the dragon
Once the dragon is defeated, rescue the princess from her cage
